title: Himi 293
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’Oku Kingi ‘a Sihova,
Ke tau fakafeta’i;
Ko hotau ‘Otua ia,
‘Oku tau lelei ai.
2.
Fakafeta’i, ki he Tamai,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa,
Ki he kakai tu’utāmaki,
‘I he’etau hia.
3.
’O ne filio’i poto,
Kia kitautolu,
Mo ne kumi ‘a e hifo,
‘Oku mahuinga.
4.
Fakafeta’i ki he ‘Alo,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa,
Mo ‘ene fa’a ‘aofia
Hotau laumālie.
5.
Pea ke tau fakafeta’i,
Ki he Laumālie;
‘I he’ene langaki mai,
‘A ‘etua mo’ui. *
